job_tasks.phrase: het ontwikkelen van mobile apps en webapplicaties
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the traditional software development of applications, which falls under building software.

job_tasks.phrase: het bewaken en verbeteren van de huidige infrastructuur en applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and improving existing infrastructure and applications are core software engineering tasks related to the lifecycle of software.
Building new functionalities is a fundamental aspect of software development.
Developing innovations, in this context, refers to creating new features or applications, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: het bouwen van GenAI implementatie in een applicatie voor het demo'en van verschillende usecases
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes integrating a GenAI implementation into an application, which is a core software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: het realiseren van sample applicaties in verschillende frameworks
job_tasks.justification: Realizing sample applications in different frameworks is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: een whitelabel applicatie opzetten op basis van een product van een van onze partners
job_tasks.justification: Setting up a whitelabel application is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: onderzoek doen naar opkomende front-end technologieën
job_tasks.justification: Researching emerging front-end technologies is related to understanding and potentially integrating new software development tools and practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt zelfstandig aan nieuwe functionaliteiten en oplossingen voor complexe situaties.
job_tasks.justification: Working independently on new functionalities and solutions for complex situations is a core software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: je neemt initiatief in het organiseren van sessies met anderen om jouw applicatie te optimaliseren.
job_tasks.justification: Taking initiative to organize sessions to optimize an application is a software development task focused on improvement and best practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Hiervoor kijk je onder andere naar de huidige werkwijze, standaarden, best practices en nieuwe technologieën.
job_tasks.justification: Looking at current practices, standards, best practices, and new technologies for application optimization falls under the umbrella of software development and continuous improvement.

soft_skills.phrase: Je hebt doorlopend contact met je stagebegeleider om samen obstakels opweg naar realisatie op te lossen of te mitigeren.
soft_skills.justification: Having continuous contact with a supervisor to solve obstacles together demonstrates communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt initiatief in het organiseren van sessies met anderen om jouw applicatie te optimaliseren.
soft_skills.justification: Taking initiative to organize sessions with others to optimize an application shows collaboration and proactive communication.

soft_skills.phrase: research doen naar opkomende front-end technologieën
soft_skills.justification: Researching emerging front-end technologies indicates a willingness to learn and adapt to new tools and practices.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt zelfstandig aan nieuwe functionaliteiten en oplossingen voor complexe situaties.
soft_skills.justification: Working independently on new functionalities and solutions shows ownership and initiative.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt initiatief in het organiseren van sessies met anderen om jouw applicatie te optimaliseren.
soft_skills.justification: Taking initiative to organize sessions to optimize an application demonstrates ownership and a proactive approach.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional software development tasks (mobile apps, web applications, building functionalities, optimizing applications) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions 'GenAI implementatie', this is presented as one of several possible internship projects and is integrated into an application. The core of the role is front-end development and application building, with AI/GenAI being a potential feature to be integrated rather than the primary focus of the role itself. Therefore, it aligns best with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear about the core software development tasks. The mention of GenAI is present but framed as one of several potential projects for an internship, suggesting it's an integration task rather than a deep specialization. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the depth of GenAI involvement is not extensively detailed.
